Package org.sales.tax.service

Interface ISalesTax

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImportedSalesTax, SalesTax
    public interface ISalesTax
    ISalesTax.java - a Java interface for calculating tax It can have multiple implementation classes, we are designed this interface as per Template Design Pattern.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    - Neel Rijhwani | rijhwani.neel@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default java.lang.String calculateTax​(Product product)
      This method provides default implementation for calculating tax.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTax

        default java.lang.String calculateTax​(Product product)
        This method provides default implementation for calculating tax. Role of this method is to calculate tax for taxable product only(not imported). If product comes under exemption then no tax would be applied.
        Parameters:
        Product - product
        Returns:
        String
